code: import React from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const PriceDistribution=_ref=>{let{products}=_ref;const priceRanges=[0,50,100,200,500,1000];const distribution=priceRanges.map((range,index)=>{const count=products.filter(product=>{const price=product.discount_price;return price>=range&&price<(priceRanges[index+1]||Infinity);}).length;return{range,count};});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"price-distribution",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Price Distribution"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{children:distribution.map(_ref2=>{let{range,count}=_ref2;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{children:["$",range," - $",priceRanges[distribution.indexOf({range,count})+1]||'and above',": ",count]},range);})})]});};export default PriceDistribution;
